docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Création de la doc ¶ Créer un repo sur github mkdocs new repo cd repo/ echo "# doc_robot_scrib" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin https://github.com/Nicobranas/doc_robot_scrib.git git push -u origin main mkdocs build echo "site/" >> .gitignore cd site echo "www.adresse.com" >> CNAME ou https://docs.github.com/en/pages/configuring-a-custom-domain-for-your-github-pages-site/managing-a-custom-domain-for-your-github-pages-site#configuring-a-subdomain
docs.title: Documentation Creation

docs.text: Créer un repo sur github mkdocs new repo cd repo/ echo "# doc_robot_scrib" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin https://github.com/Nicobranas/doc_robot_scrib.git git push -u origin main mkdocs build echo "site/" >> .gitignore cd site echo "www.adresse.com" >> CNAME ou https://docs.github.com/en/pages/configuring-a-custom-domain-for-your-github-pages-site/managing-a-custom-domain-for-your-github-pages-site#configuring-a-subdomain
docs.title: Création de la doc
